unnormalised: ## Dhavyanchea Fattofatto: Indian Airlines (ani Chai!) vangdda mhoji durdaivi ghoddnuka
normalised: ## Dhaavtya Dhagaank Fattole: Indian Airlines (ani Chai!) Sodanchim Mhojim Orthikam

unnormalised: Borem, polle, purem ugddapem korunk, hanv khoreponnan ek anubhavik bhonvddi blogger nhoi. Airportacher satot uxer zal'le blogger mhonnunk zata. Punn hem polle, konnak xistt'ttit bhonvddicho karyokrom zai poddtta jevhnn tumche lagim bori kanni asa (ani kaim tharaik zageancher power bank dovrunk zata)? Hea vellar, hem sogllem mhojea novea bhonvddek lagun asa zann hanv Indian Airwayschea adbhut, kednam-kednam dhonddhollichea sonvsarantlean bhonvddi kortam.
normalised: Ok, mhunnllear purnn ugddapnn korunk, hanv ekdom bore vatten vellayil'lo provaas blogger nhoi. Zalearui portun-portun airport-acher ushir zavpi blogger. Punn, bhaagi zaunk, konnak bore kothaanchi goroz asa (ani eka yojnachi power bank aslear zalem)? Hea vellaar, Indian Airways-achea sundar, kednam tori adhdvantam bhore bhumyecher yevpak mhaka jhozpacho anubhav zatat te vixim sangta.

unnormalised: Mhoji poili flaittt Indigo vangdda asli, Delhi than Guwahati meren. Vebsaittin 2 horanche xant flaitttachem ut'tor dil'lem. Hanv poileanch momos ani Assam chaicho sopon polletalem. Chek-in ojaporyan tras divnasto zalem, punn uprant ayil'lem mhonnllear “gett bodolpachi ghoxnna.” Gett 42B? Na, vatt poryant, atam to 48C asa! Klassik. Nimannem, ami 14:30 IST-k bord kel'lem, xistt'ttit bhonvddi suru zatokuch 45 minttam uprant. Punn hem polle, konn lekhta? (Hanv, dista.)
normalised: Mhozo poilo flight Delhi than Guwahati-k Indigo-n chalu zal'lo. Website-an don voranchi soppi flight asta mhunnlle. Hanv momos ani Assam chai-achim sopnnam pollyet ravl'lim. Check-in ekdom soppeponnann zallem, punn nantaram "gate change" ail'lem. Gate forty two B? Na, thambo, aataa forty eight C! Classic. Nimannem, ami fourteen thirty I-S-T vellar board zalim, zaka yevpak forty five mintam ushir lagle. Punn, konn zaann konn ujjepta? (Hanv, dista mhaka.)

unnormalised: Uprant Mumbai than Kochi meren Air India flaittt asli. Mhoine adimch buk keli, mhonnunk zata hanv sogllem xistt'ttit kortam. Airportacher gel'lem, punn matui koll'llem ki tem 3 horamni “operesnoll karnnank lagun” uxer zal'lem. Ghoxnna loudspeaker-acher fottki, soglleank purem vollkhunk nastole dhisle. Bhagyak, airportacher chaicho stall ugddo aslo. Mhaka Rs. 20 poddle, punn jivit rakhnnar aslo.
normalised: Ani Mumbai-thavn Kochi-k Air India flight aslem. Mhiney adim book kel'lem, mhunnllear hanv purnn zaat mhunn chintlenm. Airport-cher pounchlem, punn tin voram ushir zallem karan "operational reasons" aslem. Ghosnna loudspeaker-acher udelim, ani sogllem lok dukhi distalem. Bhag bhortalem, airport-achi chai stall ugtem aslem. Mhaka rupee twenty kharch zale, punn te jivannache salvar aslem.

unnormalised: Soglleant boro (vo mhonnunk zata, soglleant ruchicho?) vantto samananchi bharti somzun gheunk proitn korop aslo. Distta ki, 15 kg chek-in samanachi jaduchi ankddi asa, ani tea poros kitem-i odhik aslear moththo jurmano bhortok poddtta. Hanv sopon ghetam mhojem suittkes itlem voir nhoi mhonn. Dislem, mhojea aiman yatrekhatir lipoun odhik laddu bharti kele. Tichea kallzak bollachem axirvad gheum.
normalised: Soglleant borem (vo sanga, borechit zaithe?) bhagam mhunnllear baggage allowance somzonk prayatn korunk. Dista, pandra kilogram check-in baggage-ache zadu ankdda aslem, ani zaithe bharin bharavlaar mothi fine lagta mhunnlle. Hanv shapat gheta mhaje suitcase etlem bharin naslem. Uttor zalem, mhaje aayen gupchup extra ladoos zatrek dharun dile. Tiche hirdayache bhagevant zaat.

unnormalised: Bangalore than Jaipur meren mhoji SpiceJet flaittt thoddi xant zateli, deuk dhonio. Punn, flaittt-bhitorlichem magazinaant ek lek ailem zann sangta ki Jaipur Bangalore than fokot 250 km duren asa. Mhaka distta konnak tori tanchea Google Maps-achem chek korunk zai. Mhaka distta tem chodd korun 2000+ km asa!
normalised: Bangalore-thavn Jaipur-k mhaje SpiceJet flight ekdom sant zal'lem, devak dhon'nyavaad. Zalearui, in-flight magazine-an ek article aslem ani Jaipur Bangalore-thavn don xembram ani pannaas kilometr zaaite mhunnlle. Hanv khotton sangta konnank tori tache Google Maps check korche poddte. Mhaka dista don hazar plus kilometer zaate.

unnormalised: Punn khorea gunnddhun vakhan'nni korpachem ek lhan regional kerryar aslem zaka TruJet mhonnunk zata, Hyderabad than Tirupati meren bhonvddi kortolem. Vimaan junnea gaddivangodden dislem, ani paiank zago…komi aslo. Flaittt atenddents khub godd asle, punn dor ekleak Parle-G biskuttaanchi puronn packet ditalem. Atitachichea kallchi kanni mhonnunk zata!
normalised: Punn asli highlight ek lhaan pradexi carrier mhunnllear TruJet, Hyderabad-thavn Tirupati-k yetana mell'lo. Plan vintage car vori distalem, ani legroom…ekdom lhaan aslem. Flight attendants ekdom sweet asle, punn soglleank Parle-G biscuit-acho complimentary packet dharun dilo. Poilem astha mhunn ulo marunk.

unnormalised: Ek vosti zann hanvem xikleli asa ti mhonnllear mhozo PNR ankddo don pautt chek korcho (fokot zonnk zata dekhun), ani sodankal, sodankal usraponnankhatir odhik horacho gunnkar ghenvcho. Ani mhojea fonacher filmam ddaunnlodd korchi, kiteak airportacher wifi ek kitth asa.
normalised: Ek vatt hanven xiklam mhunnllear hanv moje P-N-R number (just in case) dubllim check kortam, ani sodankal sodankal ushirak ek extra voro faktor kortam. Ani moje phone-ar movies download kortam, karann airport wifi ek mithya zaata mhunnlle.

unnormalised: Sogllea usraponnank, gett bodlapank ani proxnachem chinh asa oxea bhogolik davyank lagun, hanv koslyai vostukhatir mhojea Indian Airways-chea anubhovancho vapar korunko nhoi. To yad ditalo ki bhonvddi fokot gonttvyavixim nhoi, punn akrit nhoi tea vattan, ixttagotichern ani ut'tom ritin bunoil'lea chaichea kopacher asti. Fottuch tumchea flaitttachem sthiti chek korop (SG 234 vo AI 501 vo toxem kitem-i aslear) ani ek sakaratmok vichar sanddun dovornnem. Ani zonnk zata tumcho svotaacho nashto bharti korunk sanddun dovornnem.
normalised: Usir, gate changes ani questionable geographical claims asta mhunn, hanv moje Indian Airways-achi zatra kiteakui tori denvon dharun divpak soddonk na. He ek smaron zaaite mhunn provaas mhunnllear fokot destination nhoi, punn unexpected detours, friendly faces, ani perfectly brewed cup chai zaaite. Fokot tumcho flight status check karunk yad dovortam (S-G don xembram ani tenn'tis vo A-I panch xembram ani ek vo kitemui asa mhunn) ani ek sakaratmak drishtikon divchem. Ani tumchi jevonn sangataan dharunk mhata zaaite.
